main_definition: Chargers refer to devices used to supply electrical energy to rechargeable batteries or other electronic devices, as well as a group of people who aggressively pursue their goals.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Devices that provide electric current to recharge batteries
meanings_and_examples.example: I need my phone charger because the battery is running low.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of people who work aggressively and forcefully towards a common goal
meanings_and_examples.example: The security team acted as chargers to ensure the safety of all attendees during the event.
